title: Diablo 3 World Map
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140154im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Diablo3worldmap_4849.jpg)

This is an image of the Diablo 3 World Map "Sanctuary" I've had a hard time trying to identify it. I've used many online tools to try and identify it and no luck. Letters that stand out to me are the W,V,T, and U. I wasn't sure how to classify it. It looks part script part serif. Please help me identify what font it is.

Font: 

 Vinque 

Solved By: 

 [donshottype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140154/http:/typophile.com/user/205259 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Diablo3worldmap.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140154/http:/typophile.com/files/Diablo3worldmap.jpg) | 275.48 KB |
author: swaygr

comments.content:
[Vinque](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140154/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/vinque/) by Typodermic. It's a variation of the circa 1900 Morris Troy typeface.  
Don

For an excellent and readable explanation that would help you classify this type of font I recommend [the note by HiH Retro Fonts and the HiH interpretation of the Morris font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140154/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/morris/).  
Don
